Are Gen Z employees really entitled and lazy, or is it just corporate gaslighting rebranded for a new generation? In this video, we expose the ridiculous patterns of blaming young workers, from the same tired arguments used against Millennials to the bizarre advice telling Gen Z not to negotiate salaries. Let’s break down the manipulation, hypocrisy, and how corporations use these narratives to keep
title: WHY "YOUNG PEOPLE DONT WANT TO WORK ANYMORE!"
